name: Dashy Bird (Ashton Dix)
description:
This is a fanmade game for Dashy, who is a competitive call of duty player for OpTic Texas. I've always been a fan of OpTic and I have just recently given game development another try. I needed some small projects to work on so that I can learn more and I decided to make a Flappy Bird clone but with Dashy instead.

Don't judge me too harshly as I am not very good at this but I hope you enjoy it regardless.

Dashy's Socials:

https://twitter.com/DashySZN

https://www.youtube.com/c/dashyszn
